content.detailedDescription:
Night, mostly cloudy. noticed light moving east. watching, i could see several other aircraft in the area. this one, however, had a single light that was larger, brighter and not blinking. no wing or landing lights visible. it was also moving much faster than other aircraft i have viewed from this area. also there was no sound. normally, aircraft within an arc of about 30 degrees from straight up can be easily heard; the sound always trailing the object.

this object seemed to appear through the cloud cover, northwest of my position, travel east for about short time then made a rapid "s" turn and continue east until vanishing back into the clouds. 

initial logic would describe an aircraft preparing to land at indianapolis international; about 40 miles east of this location. however, observing aircraft in this area for over a decade, this object was not exhibiting normal behavior. it was a)moving too fast, b)making no sound, c)showing no landing lights as would have been visible in the cloud layer in front of the object, d)showing no wing lights.
content.summary: Faster then normally viewed craft, single light, no sound.

content.detailedDescription:
Leaving nursing home port st lucie fl
i watch sky
ufo i've seen before
round green and red darts of light moving around
calm composed as before
dropped off horizon
content.summary: Red green lights again is sky darting about after each other4

content.detailedDescription: I was driving from atlanta to columbia,sc on i-20. it was approximately 2a.M. and my family was asleep in the car. about half way to columbia, i looked up from the highway and saw 3 craft in formation. one lead craft and 2 behind and off to the side. they were triangle in shape with a large white light at each corner. the corners were not sharp, but rounded. as i drove under the crafts i could clearly see their shape because they blotted out the stars behind them, since it was a bright, starry night.  the 3 craft made no apparent sound. i continued to drive under the 3 craft and on up i-20. by the time i had awoken my wife, we had passed the 3 craft. the most puzzling part is the fact that i did not stop the car to investigate. i had always told myself if i ever encountered anything similar that i would definitely investigate it to the best of my ability.  i drove on to columbia wondering what i had seen and still wonder what it was to this day. i would appreciate any input into solving this mystery. the crafts appeared to be at an altitude of 500 to 1000 feet. their size appeared to be 500 feet from tip of their triangle to the next tip.
content.summary: 3 triangle shape craft spotted on i-20 in ga.

content.detailedDescription:
When i was nine years old (summer of 1989, i believe) i lived in a small trailer park in colorado springs, colorado with my mother. my mother was dating a man who lived down the street from us. one evening when we were at her boyfriend's trailer, they had an argument that lasted late into the night, and at around 3am my mother awoke me so that her and i could walk home to our own trailer.

our place was directly down the street from my mother's boyfriend's place. our trailer park had a few street lights, but not many, and i remember it was extremely dark out. i held my mother's hand, and my eye focus was on my feet and the street before me. 

when we were about four trailers away from our own trailer, the street lit up all around me and my mother. we stopped and looked up, and directly above us was a large, round craft. i have no recollection of seeing it move up to us, it was just there. because i was a child at the time, and had no sense of measurement, it's hard for me to now say exactly how far above us the craft was, but i'm going to guess it hovered around 30 feet above us. it was close enough that it literally took up the whole sky; i couldn't see anything beyond it. it didn't move, it remained stationary above my mother and myself, and we stood motionless watching it in return--i have no idea for how long. 

it was perfectly circular, and in the center were three, round white lights positioned in the shape of a triangle. the craft itself was a lighter gray color. there were rows of square, orange and green lights that curved with the round shape of the craft. i don't remember exactly how many of the orange and green lights there were, or their exact configuration. it was like six or seven green lights in a row on one side, then a few orange lights in a row on another spot. i saw a lot of (i guess) tubing and mechanical looking stuff--i'm not sure how else to describe it. i've drawn a rough picture of the craft, but because i don't understand all of the mechanics i was looking at, it's a very basic interpretation of what i saw. there's no way i'd be able to recreate it exactly; that would almost be like trying to draw a circuit board, or an engine. 

as far as my feelings and reactions to the craft; i first want to say that i don't recall ever feeling any fear. it was more along the lines of fascination and curiosity. i never felt threatened at any time. the first thing i actually remember thinking and acknowledging was that the craft barely made a sound. it was just a slight humming, and the wind didn't stir or anything. the air was all calm around me. that was something that seemed abnormal to me, as though seeing this thing in the first place wasn't abnormal enough. it seems like the next thought process i remember was the actual realization of what i was looking at. i vaguely remember thinking something along the lines of, "they really are real", and somewhere deep down, it's almost like i remember feeling a form of happiness. almost like a familiar happiness; something i had felt before, or related to a feeling i had felt before. my memory of the craft itself pretty much ends about this time, so the memory of those last feelings are a bit muddy.  

next thing i knew, me and my mother were walking up the porch steps to our trailer. my recollection comes back as i'm taking the first couple steps up the porch. i remember looking at the steps, my sight turned a bit to watch my mother's feet go up the steps, then i looked at my hand which was being held in my mother's hand still. i remember at that point looking up at my mother's face; she looked straight ahead, and continued to walk to our front door. i remember thinking, "why isn't she saying anything? does she know what just happened?"

we get to the door and she puts the key in the lock, and it was at that point, before she turned the knob to open the door, that she looked down at me and asked if we just saw what she thought we saw. i just remember shaking my head, yes. she said that we shouldn't tell anyone about it, and not to talk about it ever. we both went straight to bed, and i don't believe either of us looked at a clock. because of this last fact, i can't say whether or not we lost any time, or if i simply lost my memory of the craft leaving and the walk home.

the next day it ended up being all over the local news and radio that somewhere around 200 people (i believe more than that, actually) had been calling in ufo sightings all throughout the night, many of whom lived in our general area of the city.
content.summary: A large craft hovered directly over me and my mother for an unknown length of time. i experienced a loss of memory.

content.detailedDescription: Myself and my fiance along with a friend from work were talking in my front yard .I looked up and observed a large airliner leaving a long wide contrail, i told them to look at it because i commented that the government is using that to poison us,(jokingly) and as we all looked up the object came shooting in from the east into the contrail approx, 2000yrds behind the airliner ,traveled corkscrew around the contrail away from the plane ,came out of it to the east and went up outta site as fast as a gunshot, we were astonished and questioned each other as to whether or not we all had seen the same thing. and we agree we shared a ufo sighting.
content.summary: Was observing the con trail from a passenger airliner with 2 other people,it shot sideways and dipped into contrail ,followed it a short ways then shot away at abnormal speed.

content.detailedDescription: Walking out to car with my mom and saw what i thought to be a flare, as did she. we found it did not fade out and it changed directions ascending and descending. there was no wind that night and it was moving at diagonal angles and when it disappeared instead of just falling to the ground it quickly ascended into the sky silently
content.summary: Going outside to car and saw what i thought was a flare, but found to not be

content.detailedDescription:
I was out on may 24th 2014 viewing the meteor shower. shortly after 3am this brilliant white glowing oval appeared in the sky south & east of my position at somewhere near 25-30 degrees above the horizon. it appeared to be hanging in the sky with the edges of the slim oval pointing up and down, it made me feel as if it was attached to something above it but that was only an impression. it was moving in a direction from south to north. it was moving at a rate of speed much less than any traffic would move past. it was moving much slower than any meteorite could have moved. it was closer to the earth than any satellite could have possibly been. there are some very tall trees in my yard east of where i was and it was just above them. i lost sight of it when it went far enough to the north that it went behind the tree line 800 to 1000 feet north of where i was. the whole sighting was about 30-40 seconds. it was completely silent and it was glowing brilliant white. it could not have been reflecting from the sun or moon as they were not in the right positions to reflect on the side of it that was facing me. at first i didn't know what it could be and i went through my mind trying to come up with possible things it could be. nothing fit what was happening. when i finally decided it must be a ufo i was a little afraid and hoped it would keep moving. it shook me up enough that i didn't want to talk about it for a few days and i search youtube for anything that looked like it. i only found 1 or 2 possible ufo videos that may be the same shape and size. as far as size i can't say for sure how big it was because i have no clue how far it really was away from me. i am now fairly convinced that it was a real ufo. i wish i had had a camera or some sort of recorder with me to capture it on film but i didn't. i am an artist so i suppose i could draw it or paint it. 
maybe i will some day, it will be burned into my memory for a long time!
content.summary: It appeared to be a thin oval. it looked like it was hanging in the sky and was moving in a moderately slow path from the south to the north. it was much slower than any meteorite, very much closer to earth than any satellite. it glowed white was silent.

content.detailedDescription: Was filming a vandenberg missle launch,from my back yard in santa maria ca, when a small brite light appeared over the ocean. it crossed the distance from around guadalupe beach to over lompoc in about 3 seconds with no sound,  then it hovered over vandenberg where the missle had taken off. after a few seconds it dissapared. i had some not so good video of the missle launch and the ufo but lost it.
content.summary: Saw a light come over the ocean and headed toward a vandenberg missle launch.

content.detailedDescription:
Outdoors around 11:30pm noticed a very low altitude moving bright, white light. i knew what it was because i had seen one before-very, very creepy.
the light and movement is not the same as any aircraft. then later, noticed two high altitude lights, thinking they were stars, start moving-one following the other. double creepy.
content.summary: Bright lights

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing on a west facing balcony of the hard rock hotel in cancun taking pictures of the sunset. at the time i did not notice anything. when i got home and started editing my photos i noticed the obvious craft in the pictures. 
i was shooting a canon 7d camera with a 24-70 mm lens at the time. i was shooting hdr images. this process combines three separate images, all with varying exposures, this particular image consisted of 3 shots. it craft appears in all three shots, albeit in slightly different locations in the frame (indicates motion to me). 
i was shooting in "camera raw" mode and have the original images still stored on the memory card from the camera. i hereby attest these images are un-doctored, unedited and 100% the real thing. 
it is my camera, my gear and i pushed the shutter button when they were taken.

the attached images were screen shots taken with my phone but i will gladly provide the originals for your examination. 
the first image is of my computer screen with one of the shots pulled up full screen. i can be seen ghosted in the image, but the white "dot" in the upper left corner is the craft.

the second attached image is a close-up of the "white dot" in the image. it has clear structure with what apear to be 4 domes, or lights on it. 

the third image is the three shots combined in photomatix software that clearly shows the movement of the craft. 

all three of these images were captures less than a second apart. 

please let me know what you think.
content.summary: Round disk with 4 domes or lights.

content.detailedDescription:
I was heading from my house to my room in my trailer, i usaully look in the sky and west coming over the mountain was a bright orange light, i could tell it was moving and not stationary. it was quiet outside most of that time. i tried to use my ipod to pick up the light because it was so bright but it was so dark i didn't get a single thing. i thought i saw a small strip of lights on it but not sure. i was just curious of the light because i didn't hear sounds of a jet or plane. i acted normal, i just thought it was weird though.

i lost sight of the object when it disappeared behind some clouds but right before it hit the clouds it kinda went dim then disappeared behind the clouds.
content.summary: Bright orange light, very quiet outside. heading west to east then disappeared in clouds

content.detailedDescription:
tuesday june 17th at about 4:15am 
i leave my house to do a run.
i go south on center and do a lap around the library near gardner city hall and then head back north on center street.
i continue past the auction house and continue towards gardner lake. at around 4:40am i am near 163rd street(i checked my phone for the time to know when to head back) i saw what appeared to be a bright blue/white shooting star going in the wrong direction.(meaning: going straight upward and then vanished) the object looked far away like it came up from the south side of town.
it was fast and bright like a shooting star would be except, of course, for the direction i would have paid no more attention to it. the entire observation was just a couple of seconds
the direction of motion struck me as odd and decided the right thing to do is report it.
content.summary: 4:40 am while doing my morning run i observed a blue-white starlike object going from the ground upward to the sky. like a shooting star going in the wrong direction. very fast and bright. i saw it facing south on center street and 163rd before the lake.

content.detailedDescription:
I am reporting this for my daughter and son in law. 

they live on lake granbury near long creek. they observed an object that hovered for some time over a field that is used for the growth of grass for residential construction (king ranch grass co). my daughter came out of her house and was able to video the lights and object with her iphone.

the area is very secluded and they live on a dead end street. there are no tall structures in the area that could be confused with the lights on the video. 

my daughter sent me a copy of the video and i have saved it on my home computer and i located it while cleaning up my mac mini for space. i wanted to forward it to mufon before it gets lost or deleted.

she is not a prankster and has no means of creating the video for hoaxing. we are not even sure what it is but thought mufon would be interested in seeing the video. we are not claiming it to be a ufo.

she is willing to discuss the occurrence and video if mufon has interest in talking to her and her husband.
content.summary: Lights hovered over a rural pasture and remained stationary for sometime.

content.detailedDescription:
1. went out to back yard for a cigarette
2. looked up at stars and immediately noticed bright pulsating orange "star"
3. first thought was maybe mars, then maybe helicopter, then realized it was neither
4. first observed as bright orange pulsating star, continued observation lights included red, blue and white. object hovered then rotated on y axis drifted north then slowly dissappeared
5. first reaction was surprise, then attempted analysis, then a sense of excitement, disbelief, anxiety
6. watched it until it turned and faded out
content.summary: First observed as bright orange pulsating star, continued observation lights included red, blue and white.

content.detailedDescription: Myself, my sister and a family friend were walking along a country road at midnight  at the end of august summer of 1977, we were walking almost straight north when we seen a red light travelling fairly slow in the direction from northwest to southeast, as the object was at about 1:00 in the sky, the object stopped in mid air with absolutely no sound, it stayed in the same spot for approximately 3 minutes and then shot off to the southeast at a speed that even modern aircraft cannot travel at, in comparison, i have seen the space shuttle numerous times fly from horizon to horizon and travelling at 28,000 kilometres per hour seems extremely slow compared to the speed of the object that we seen that night, and especially the fact that the object stopped and appeared to hover and then instantly disappeared over the horizon to the southeast, no jet could hover with no sound for three minutes and then accelerate at the speed that this object travelled, we told our parents what we had seen and they told us that we seen a falling star type of object,  this was absolutely not the case, as the next morning on the regina news a ufo had landed southeast of regina, and that was the direction the object have travelled in and then went out of sight! there was absolutely no sound from this craft at all!
content.summary: Came from nw, stopped and hovered for 3 minutesat about 1:00 in the night sky, then instantly shot off to the se at a speed that no technology even today is capable, landing site was reported on regina news the next morning!

content.detailedDescription: I was coming home from mother in laws house. i was in the back seat looking up at the nice looking clouds and super nice clear day. after a min i noticed a super bright round light moving in same direction we was driving. headed home to oakdale from turlock on geer rd near the fruit yard place. this thing seemed like it wanted me to see it. as we slowed down it slowed down then speed up then it did too. it went into clouds and out like a plane but this was no plane. this fallowed us for 15 min or so, then we turned and it turned, for about 2 more miles. it went into another cloud but did'nt come out. not sure if ufo or some kind of enity or somthing? i did not feel bad, i felt good, like i was meant to see it. no ideal what it was.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Seem to want  me to see it as i was in back seat of car looking up it traveled into and out of couds slow then fast at times

content.detailedDescription:
As i started home from work at 5:00 am i noticed a starlike object that followed my car. it followed me down the palmetto expressway and down to my home in homestead, fl. as i neared my home the object got closer to me. it was huge, the size of a house. i arrived at my home at 5:45 -5:46.  the light was flashing all over the area, but it made no noise. it then shot out beams of light like a laser. i was scared. i wondered if it might be a drone. i took a few pictures of it.  i called the security guard at the gate but he hadn't seen the object.  i will check with a woman who rides around in a golf cart to see whether everything is ok.



[entered by mary margaret zimmer, fi, from account given to me by the witness.]
content.summary: Light followed me home from work

content.detailedDescription:
On october 11 2013, i had driven to our local grocery store around 10:30 pm to grab some snacks as they were closing at 11 pm.
it was storming outside but the trip there and back only took me about 15 minutes in total. 
as i exited my car to go inside my home i noticed an object hovering in the darkened sky to the south. although i live not far from the local airport i am very familiar with aircraft flight patterns and this did not look like any aircraft i had ever seen in my entire life. 
i pulled out my lumia phone and started the video recording mode.

the object looked almost cylindrical and was illuminated from within. it just sat motionless in the sky slowly and randomly pulsating different colors. even with all the lightning lighting up the whole area, i could still see it sitting there not moving at all. the sky was really flashing with lightning and it started to rain quite hard to i ran into the house to get out of the weather.

inside i started playing around with the phone trying to show my wife the video. as i had not had the phone very long i was unable to get it working to show her. i gave up after about 30 minutes and over the next couple of days it faded from memory.

about 6 months later i discovered that i had cloud service for the phone data and lo and behold i was able to recover the video on my laptop. i was very happy to show my wife and son what i had seen that night but what i hadn't expected to see is what appeared in the sky along with what i had originally recorded. 

i was shocked to see to the right of the hovering object slowly appeared a shimmering cone of tendrils that seemed to sit motionless in the sky as well. 
it glowed and was bright enough to be seen even with the lightning going off.
i had never heard of anything like it being caught on video before so i hope to see if anyone else has reported a similar incident.
content.summary: During thunderstorm i witnessed a pulsating/glowing cigar shaped object hovering in the sky near my home

content.detailedDescription: Luz en el cielo en camino recto y moviendose a ambos lados,se queda parada  2 minutos y de esa luz veo como sale un resplandor como si fuera un rayo de color azul y morado y veo que sale una luz igual ala primera en direccion al sur, y la primera luz que me vi sigue parada unos minutos y sigue en camino recto moviendose a ambos lados mientras la segunda luz se pierde acia el sur y eso lo veo casi todos los dias ala misma hora sobre las 10:30 o 11 de la noche ..
content.summary: Luz en el cielo en camino recto y moviendose a ambos lados y de esa luz sale otra luz igual ala primera

content.detailedDescription: Other than this encounter, i have had two other experiences with ufos one with them flying over nellis air force base in las vegas, nevada and the other when i was twelve on my grandparents farm in beekmantown, new york, also near the now closed down plattsburgh air force base and now this one - if it is one. i also live 1/4 of a mile from offit air force base. all have denied any knowledge of any such object(s) in their area, which leaves me to wonder. i am paralyzed from the waist down and can't move and i wanted a picture of the blood moon on april 15, 2014, so i took my canon camera and tried to position it so i could get it in my open window behind my head as i am incapable of turning around to do so. when i took the photos off the camera and looked at them i saw these that i am uploading to you and not the blood moon. i don't really know for sure what it is, but it looks like one.
content.summary: Just a circular object too black to see except for the red-orange lights and then they zoomed off towards the east

content.detailedDescription: I was looking at  the full moon and i. saw a dull orang  light i thought it was a lantern  but it was moving way to fast not as fast as a  shooting star but faster then a jet . i said out loud 4 times what is that. it was moving from south  east to north west it looked like it was really  high   i have never seen anything like it what was it?
content.summary: I was looking at full moon.I thought it was a lantern it was moving way to fast faster then an air plain  not as fast as  metro  there was no sound i  have never seen anything like it . if you know can you contact me my family thinks i  am crazy thank you

content.detailedDescription: Saw what looked like a star,but it didn't have a pinpoint of light like a star.It wad daylight and i thought,what the heck is this,its not a balloon,its not a star and not an airplane,it was pretty far up,and iuts shape was circular but almost like a blob.It just hung there,making no noise.Called wife and daughter out to see this thing,and then we saw it through binoculars and telescope,and then saw it turn into a perfect triangle,not solid but like a pool table rack that you rack the balls in because it was perfectly triangular,yet empty in the middle.It then turned into a sort of like a hose shape and had a reddish glow on the top part of the hose shape.It just hung there and didn't move,and then just faded away.We are all looking at this thing that changed into a triangle,and i thought we are actually witnissing a ufo,and its happening to us.We were all sort of freaking out,like these things don't really happen in real life,do they?  we have a digital photo of object before it morphed,which is still in phone
content.summary: Was small white roundish ball,saw it turn into a perfect,daughter  started to hyper ventillate and wanted to run into house,wife saw it to change int triangle

content.altitude: Landed, Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription: 06-07-2014 several ufos recorded from my rc airplane again.... this time i captured a lot of them. i have posted edited versions of the original video on youtube under xezgamerx i have also attached them to this report along with the original raw footage from my new mobius hd camera. on the day of recording i did see something, i noticed the same really fast flicker of light in the sky next to my rc airplane that i noticed before on a different day, it looked like a piece of plastic wrap glimmering in the sun light when it happened it was very fast and i noticed it happen twice. the next day or the day after that i also noticed a small airplane fly in circles around this location, possibly taking pictures? the plane did 2 circles over this exact spot very low and slow "not a normal flight pattern" before flying out of view at a very low altitude. this airplane was very low but i couldn't see any identification markers on it, it was all white.
content.distance: 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile, Unknown
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other,Unknown
content.summary: Several ufos recorded from my rc airplane again.

content.detailedDescription:
1.  i was out feeding farm animals about 7:30 pm friday june 13, 2014. 
2.  i heard what sounded like a small engine i looked up, i was in front of the house and the noise was coming from in the air on the back side of the house.
3.  i immediately got scared because i never saw anything like this object before and my mind just couldn't figure out what it was. it was flying so low and was so strange looking.
4. it looked like a large rectangle about 30 feet across and i'm not sure maybe 4 or five feet wide.  it had two huge white pulsating lights about the size of the old car headlights, being round.  the lights were centered about one third up from the ends of the rectangle.  i ran to get my camera and i tried to get a picture of it and i couldn't because it was still to light and not dark enough to focus.  the strange thing was that the back of the ufo also had the same huge white pulsating lights on the back side of it as it was flying away.  
5.  well i am very used to seeing planes of all types out here in the mountains.  an airport is about 15 miles from here and it wasn't an airplane. it wasn't a passenger anything.  i am 68years old and have seen a lot of flying machines and pictures and videos of drones, but this was none of those.  i was so scared because it was flying so low and unfamiliar.  it just was on a flight path over my house coming from snowflake arizona across concho, and on the way to show low az. i started shaking and really didn't know what to do, i was afraid it would land and i was home alone at the time.  i had my 4-wheeler lights on because it was getting dark and i turned the light off right away, i didn't want who or what this thing was to catch sight of me and come on down and visit me.  i went and got my camera right away which took about 3 minutes and by then the ufo flew over the house and was heading to show low arizona.  i tried to get pictures of it but the camera wouldn't focus right.  i was shaking really badly.  i wanted to get a picture so someone would believe me, because it is pretty unbelievable.  plus i wanted to know what the heck it was.  the lights, all four of them, two in front and the two in back were pulsating rather than the rapid flashing planes lights flash, and the four lights were really bright. i called my friend who lived toward show low and told her to get her camera and see if she could get a picture of it but she said she saw it but it was to far from her so she couldn't get a picture either.  i talked to her the next day and she said she talked to a neighbor and they saw it also.  i don't know what or how much they saw of the ufo.  i haven't talked to her recently to find out what her neighbor so.  i called the police in show low but they hadn't heard anything about it.  
6.  as i was trying to get some pictures of the ufo with my camera, it just steadily kept flying toward show low arizona about 15 miles away.  then i lost sight of it. i am going to try to find someone who lives in show low or near town who got a picture of the ufo.  

i keep looking to the sky at night about the same time to see if the ufo is coming back.  i don't want to run into this thing.
content.summary: Was out side heard what sounded like small engine looked up and saw ufo comming toward my house

content.detailedDescription:
Estaba sentado cerca de una de las entradas a la plataforma del aeropuerto y senti que tenia que mirar hacia arriba , tras unos minutos de buscar en el cielo alcanze a ver una peque������a luz , desde mi posicion pude verla cerca de una de las antenas de la torre de control , rapidamente saque la camara de fotos del trabajo y tras buscar de nuevo en la pantalla de la camara le hago la primera foto , estaba feliz de haber podido hacer la foto ( meses atras no hice foto de un objeto mucho mas cercano ) , tras indicar al elemento de seguridad que habia un objeto en el cielo , llegaron trabajadores de las aerolineas y pudieron ver todos el objeto . le tome una foto con zoom digital que salio mal y otra con el mismo zoom de la primera con una diferencia de 8 minutos entre ambas el objeto ahora estaba del otro lado de la antena de la torre . me cambie de posicion y tras informar al personal que estaba trabajando cerca de la plataforma estos vieron el objeto , saque varias fotos desde una nueva posicion con una diferencia de 2 horas y 19 minutos , saque mas fotos y al ver el objeto no hacia nada ni desaparecia tras ya casi 4 horas desde que no lo vi decidi regresar a trabajar .
posteriormente tras ver las fotos en la ultima habia una segunda luz de la que nadie pudo ver en esos momentos
content.summary: Parecia un objeto redondo a una elevadisima altura

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home on the 421 bypass in harlan when two state troopers suddenly approached me from behind - one moved in front of me and the other stayed behind me (as if i was being penned in), when abruptly the trooper in front of me slammed his brakes. as i braked, in my periphery (to my right), i saw two red lights about 50 feet apart, hovering approximately 250 feet in the sky. for a split second, i looked back at the state trooper in front of me to make certain he was a good distance in front of me, then i looked back to where i had seen the lights (this took less than one second). now, two green lights had joined underneath the red lights, and the entire light sequence rotated into a vertical position, as i lost sight of them. i was so excited (when i saw these lights rotate in a vertical fashion), that i turned around at the first chance i could turn off the highway, when i realized i wasn't being pulled over by the state troopers, and went back to see if it was still there. it was not.
content.summary: Saw two red lights, joined by two green lights. from a stationary position, the entire string of lights rotated into a vertical position.

content.detailedDescription: Diamond shape ,hovered a lot
content.summary: Lights 2 to 3 hundred feet above sea one mile off shore

content.detailedDescription: Hiking at diamond valley lake on trails.  i thought the object was a helicopter, but it didn't make a sound other than a hum and or swish sound.  it was circular in shape and it made a straight almost perfect path down about a 100 feet then up exactly where it started, then side to side.  i took several speed frame pictures and the two that came out shows exactly how fast this object disappeared.  this happened for about 30 seconds and then it was gone.  about ten seconds later a f15 fighter jet came into the area passing over the lake about 10 times; as if the pilot was looking for something.  very crazy set of events for sure.  i could not wrap my head around what happened until i saw the photo; i am a serious skeptic when it comes to ufo sightings, but after this i'm starting to believe.  when the object took off you can only see a light streak behind it and then it was gone what seemed to be straight up.  i would really like to see if you can debunk this, because i am still skeptical and would like someone to explain this logically to me.  thank you for your time.
content.summary: Hovering then gone; f15 fighter spoted after

content.detailedDescription:
Sighting occurred around 8 pm - (estimate) walked out the back door to water the garden.  possibly glanced at sky due to brightly colored sunset.  immediately saw the large ufo pulling up/forming behind the tree.  laughed it off as clouds with sunset reflection because i continuously watch lenticular clouds form & dissipate in that exact spot.  as i walked toward the garden, i noticed a second ufo nestled above 2 mountains further away.  that's when i really started to pay attention and focus on what was really happening right in front of my eyes.
i began to alternate between watering the garden, caring for animals, watching with my naked eye, taking photos and recording video.  the sighting went on for an extended period of time.  time stamps on my phone will reveal the true elapsed time.  i was lost in the experience, but it felt like 30+ minutes to me.
there were multiple crafts in various stages of mist/solids during the duration of my sighting.  i knew exactly what i was looking at once i was able to view it from multiple locations in my yard.  after a brief sighting in phoenix, az a few years ago i began to do hobby level research on topics related to unexplained phenomenon, so i'd seen photos of (cloud cloaked ufos?).
i knew i was witnessing something amazing.  i remember hearing the town bustling around me and thinking "is nobody else looking up?"  i called my boyfriend out and he stayed on the porch for a few minutes viewing them, but eventually lost interest and returned to his movie.  the movements were slow & subtle like morphing (for lack of a better term) so you really had to keep your eyes on it to see the progression of the physical alterations.
only after i went indoors and viewed multiple photos and videos that i captured, did i realize that i could actually see many of the details/movement that i had witnessed with my naked eye.  excited, i posted my sighting to facebook.  almost immediately an aquaintance/facebook friend started to ask questions and share her photographs of the exact same ufos over indigo, ca.  her sighting occurred several weeks earlier.  it was at this point that i realized the gravity of what we had captured.  individually, our sightings are much like many others.  together however, they tell a story that's far more difficult to dismiss.  
i'd rather not describe the encounter in to much detail.  i want to stick to simple facts so the pertinent details remain clear to me.  bottom line - i know what i saw was not clouds.  it was in the clouds, but entirely separate from them.  it almost seemed to use and/or effect the atmosphere/clouds around it.
as i'm writing this my neighbor arrived, telling me that she and her daughter witnessed it as well and captured photos on her phone.  they will send me some.
i'm not tech savvy, so i'll do my best to send some images that i captured.  be aware that there is much more.  i lost sight of the ufos as darkness fell.  the last thing i witnessed was a disc ufo arrive over the mountains behind me.
content.summary: Same 2 ufos in 2 different locations, photographed by 2 friends without the others knowledge

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my deck in my back yard with my spouse. i observed to my nw an object that i believed to be a balloon floating. random party balloons floating by is not too uncommon to see on holidays around here. i would check its progress to see wind direction every 20-30 seconds or so. i noticed it had not moved. i oriented the object to a tree in my back yard to see if it was moving at all. i then noticed a flicker of light emanating from it. my initial thought was that it was a mylar balloon and it was reflecting light from the shiny side of the balloon as it gently rotated towards and then away from the setting sun. again, i thought it odd it had not moved left or right or appeared to get closer or farther away. i asked my wife to retrieve my binoculars. once i had them i reacquired the object and observed a dark pod like object with a brilliant pulsating aqua blue strobe light to one side of the craft. i observed the object for nearly 20-30 seconds and then gave the binoculars to my wife. when i went to point it out her again so she could orient the binoculars it was gone. it did not move and from the time i observed it till the time it we lost sight of it. my wife is near sighted and never saw it. very frustrating.

i believed it to be approximately 50 degrees above the horizon and at an altitude that we often see low flying craft such as helicopters and small planes. it was hard to gauge distance but i would guess 4-6 miles away. the sky was still very blue for being later in the day and no clouds to speak of. it was a beautiful sky for fathers day.

that was no balloon...It was a solid craft. thank you for your time.
content.summary: Black pod shaped object with what appeared to be edges. brilliant pulsating aqua blue light.
